key_title: Key to the species of Aster

source.author: Walsh, N.G.
source.title: Aster

leads.lead_text: Ligulate florets at least twice as long as involucral bracts; plants distinctly rhizomatous
Ligulate florets barely exceeding involucral bracts; plants taprooted to shortly rhizomatous
